titleStmt.title: Of the visible sacrifice of the Church of God· The first part. VVritten by Anonymus Eremita
titleStmt.author: Doughty, Thomas, fl. 1618-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Hubert Antony Velpius, printer to his Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The second part has separate register, pagination, and title page dated 1638.
Identified as STC 21540 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
